snippet: Although G.D.P. remains on track to hit government targets for the year, domestic debt has been expanding dramatically.
abstract: China announces that its economy grew 7.5 percent in second quarter, slightly better than expected.
lead_paragraph: Although G.D.P. remains on track to hit government targets for the year, domestic debt has been expanding dramatically.

headline.main: China Says Lending Put Growth Rate at 7.5 Percent
headline.print_headline: China Says Lending Put Growth Rate at 7.5 Percent
